# Ormy the Ferret
<!-- markdownlint-disable MD033 -->

<p align="center">
  <img src="/images/ormy_1.png" alt="Ormy the Ferret" height="400">
</p>

Pydantic-compatible ORM (and ORM-like) wrappers of various kinds.
